name: The Ninja Ducks
description:
Good luck racing your friends in this hyper frantic platformer!

Plug in multiple controllers to play local multiplayer, and/or use http://parsec.app to allow online multiplayer.

Play in browser, or for a smoother experience, download the Windows/Mac executable. Parsec will work either way.

After starting the game, press the left and right bumpers together to join. You can then customize your Ninja! Confirm your selection and jump around the platform while waiting for your friends. Once everyone is in, ready up by holding the left and right bumpers to begin stage selection. Move to the stage you want to select it! 

When playing, your goal is to reach the finish line the most times before the time runs out. If you either reach the finish or fall in the water, you will enter a trap placement mode. Place a new trap to help your future runs or thwart your opponents. You will then respawn to try again!

All of this and more is explained in the interactive tutorial in game. Enjoy! Leave a comment on what your favorite part is!

This game was made for Georgia Tech's Video Game Design class: CS 6457

Team Duck members: Michael Parr, Chris Bouma, Justin Gensel, Kenan Bateman, Daniel Zablocky
